channel.title: Player.handler help plz
channel.description:
i wanted 2 knoe how to: wen some1 uses ::noclip i want ever1 to see that he did it like (person: (player.handler) no-cliped. name
ty

item.title: Player.handler help plz
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

Well first off this isn’t a PlayerHandler.java code issue.

Open up Client.Java in notepad and hit Control + F, or click Edit > Find.

In the Find box type

else if(command.startsWith("noclip"))

Something like this should then appear:

else if(command.startsWith("noclip"))
{
STUFF HERE
}

Just right before the last } put this line of code in:

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " has just used the command ::noclip");

Then hit File > Save, Compile it, and run your server and test it out.
Post here if it doesn’t work.

Hope I helped
-TeleNubby

Read full topic
